protein.general_function: Involved in UDP-glucuronic acid transmembrane transport
protein.specific_function: Transports both UDP-glucuronic acid (UDP-GlcA) and UDP-N-acetylgalactosamine (UDP-GalNAc) from the cytoplasm to into the endoplasmic reticulum lumen. May participate in glucuronidation and/or chondroitin sulfate biosynthesis.

reference.reference_text: Muraoka M, Kawakita M, Ishida N: Molecular characterization of human UDP-glucuronic acid/UDP-N-acetylgalactosamine transporter, a novel nucleotide sugar transporter with dual substrate specificity. FEBS Lett. 2001 Apr 20;495(1-2):87-93.
